text: @OliverDowden Is there a planet for us normal law /rule abiding people and another for delusional members of government as in my mind it was fully pointed out if you or a member of your family shows signs of covid-19 STAY AT HOME! Obviously you don't need much common sense to be an mp

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
